headline: Southern Company Gas Expands Clean Energy Portfolio with New RNG Deals in Virginia and Tennessee
summary: The Southern Company (NYSE:SO) is among the 13 Best Electrical Infrastructure Stocks to Invest In. Southern Company Gas, a wholly owned subsidiary of Atlanta-based The Southern Company (NYSE:SO), announced new renewable natural gas (RNG) acquisitions by its Chattanooga Gas and Virginia Natural Gas subsidiaries on June 25, 2025. According to estimates, the transactions will reduce […]
